items.sentence: Tom became good friends with the elevator operator in their hotel.
Tom showed me the poems that he\'d written when he was a teenager.
Tom sat by the pool drinking red wine and eating expensive cheese.
I heard that Tom used to hang out with drug dealers and murderers.
I consider spaghetti to be one of the greatest foods in the world.
I find it hard to believe that Tom was involved in the kidnapping.
I shouldn\'t have put my laptop so close to the edge of the table.
I spoke to him in English, but I couldn\'t make myself understood.
I made Tom promise me that he wouldn\'t tell anyone what happened.
I think that it\'s unlikely that Tom will come to the party alone.
